entities.name: fingers
entities.description: Fang's fingers were smashed on the floor.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang yelped and was barking madly at the door.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron whispered 'It's her!' and tore around the table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry said 'Get under here!' and seized the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione was covered by the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid looked thoroughly confused and hid their mugs.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge was standing in the doorway.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Harry seized the Invisibility Cloak and covered himself and Hermione.

entities.name: doorway
entities.description: The shadow of somebody small rippled across the thin curtain beside the doorway.

entities.name: window
entities.description: All four of them stared at the window beside the doorway.

relationships.description: Hagrid hid their mugs under the cushion in Fang's basket.
Harry seized the Invisibility Cloak and covered himself and Hermione.
Ron was covered by the Invisibility Cloak.
Hermione was covered by the Invisibility Cloak.
Hagrid pushed Fang out of the way with his foot.
Professor Umbridge was standing in the doorway.
